teaser: First up, April Glaser, an activist with the Electronic Frontier Foundation, talks about what’s next in the ongoing discussion about Net Neutrality. Plus, Marketplace Tech reporter Tracey Samuelson has more on the banking technologies coming out of Fintech – an innovation lab in New York that helps financial service startups develop new products. Finally, we speak to Dayo Olopade, author of The Bright Continent: Breaking Rules and Making Change in Modern Africa.
title: Marketplace Tech for Monday, June 30, 2014
description: First up, April Glaser, an activist with the Electronic Frontier Foundation, talks about what’s next in the ongoing discussion about Net Neutrality. Plus, Marketplace Tech reporter Tracey Samuelson has more on the banking technologies coming out of Fintech – an innovation lab in New York that helps financial service startups develop new products. Finally, we speak to Dayo Olopade, author of The Bright Continent: Breaking Rules and Making Change in Modern Africa.
